attributes.action: Work to strengthenthe union both institutionally and culturaly.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst wholeheartedly accepting the devolution settlements created in the late 20th century, we the signitories of this petition call for the Government of the United Kingdom to enact measures aimed at giving the people throughout the UK a real sense of British identity-we have been through too much as a people to simply vote our nation out of existance.

United we stand, divided we fall
